description:
Anthony really is the guy next door, actually the guy around the corner to be exact.
We have been seeing this guy walk back and forth to the local market for months now. Finally we approached him with an offer that he couldn't resist.
When we got back to the apartment and started talking with Anthony he was going on and on about walking back and forth to the market and how many chicks he has scored on the way to and from. Seems as if this stud really was out for fresh meat, lucky for you, so were we! Once this stud undressed and showed us what he was made of, it was easy to see why he has such an easy time with the ladies.
title: Anthony
